SEARCH
Module com.example.towersofhanoi
Package com.example.towersofhanoi.Model

Interface DatabaseConnection<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type parameter for the user information
All Known Implementing Classes:
MongoDBConnection, MySQLConnection
public interface DatabaseConnection<T>
The DatabaseConnection interface defines the methods for connecting to a database, performing various operations, and extracting data from the database.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    checkIfUserExists(String username, String password)
    Checks if a user with the specified username and password exists in the database.
    boolean
    checkIfUserExistsSI(String username, String password)
    Checks if a user with the specified username or password exists in the database.
    void
    connect()
    Connects to the database.
    void
    deleteAccount(String username)
    Deletes the account associated with the specified username from the database.
    void
    disconnect()
    Disconnects from the database.
    void
    extractStatistics(javafx.scene.control.TableView<StatisticsData> statisticsTable)
    Extracts statistics data from the database and populates it into the specified TableView.
    int
    getLatestUserId()
    Gets the ID of the latest added user in the database (the auto_increment current value).
    T
    getUserByUsername(String username)
    Retrieves user information from the database based on the specified username.
    void
    insertNewUser(String first_name, String last_name, String username, String password)
    Inserts a new user with the specified first name, last name, username, and password into the database.
    void
    updateUsername(String currentUsername, String newUsername)
    Updates the username for the account with the specified currentUsername to the newUsername.

  • Method Details

    • connect

      void connect()
      Connects to the database.

    • disconnect

      void disconnect()
      Disconnects from the database.

    • checkIfUserExists

      boolean checkIfUserExists(String username, String password)
      Checks if a user with the specified username and password exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      password - the password of the user
      Returns:
      true if the user exists, false otherwise

    • checkIfUserExistsSI

      boolean checkIfUserExistsSI(String username, String password)
      Checks if a user with the specified username or password exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      password - the password of the user
      Returns:
      true if the user exists, false otherwise

    • deleteAccount

      void deleteAccount(String username)
      Deletes the account associated with the specified username from the database.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the account to be deleted

    • updateUsername

      void updateUsername(String currentUsername, String newUsername)
      Updates the username for the account with the specified currentUsername to the newUsername.
      Parameters:
      currentUsername - the current username
      newUsername - the new username

    • getUserByUsername

      T getUserByUsername(String username)
      Retrieves user information from the database based on the specified username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      Returns:
      the user information of type T

    • getLatestUserId

      int getLatestUserId()
      Gets the ID of the latest added user in the database (the auto_increment current value).
      Returns:
      the latest user ID

    • insertNewUser

      void insertNewUser(String first_name, String last_name, String username, String password)
      Inserts a new user with the specified first name, last name, username, and password into the database.
      Parameters:
      first_name - the first name of the new user
      last_name - the last name of the new user
      username - the username of the new user
      password - the password of the new user

    • extractStatistics

      void extractStatistics(javafx.scene.control.TableView<StatisticsData> statisticsTable)
      Extracts statistics data from the database and populates it into the specified TableView.
      Parameters:
      statisticsTable - the TableView to populate with statistics data
